pages.title: Redstone Basics
pages.summary: Learn how to power your creations.
content: Use dust, repeaters, and torches to power anything.
Start simple and build up to complex contraptions!

pages.title: Mob Farming
content: Choose a mob spawn spot and build walls.
Use water or fall traps to collect drops safely.
Lighting control is key to maximize spawn rates.

pages.title: Enchanting Guide
content: Build an enchantment table surrounded by bookshelves.
Lapis lazuli + XP ⇒ enchant your tools and armor.
